scripts.watch: watchify js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-decorators-legacy ] ] -o build/app.js --debug --verbose
scripts.build: browserify js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-decorators-legacy ] ] --debug | exorcist build/app.js.map | uglifyjs -c > build/app.js
